A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not quite as good as I could have hoped but that being said I didn't leave disappointed. I was surprised at every turn with Rian's creative choices (that can be good and bad) Did it destroy the momentum of the new trilogy...? no. Did it change everything we know about the franchise? Yes & No. This is the beginning of the end and we have JJ to tie up all the loose ends. Here's hoping that fans will get the finale they deserve.
